title: StanChart resumes dividend but revenues disappoint
text:
StanChart resumes dividend but revenues disappoint Tuesday, February 27, 2018 - 01:35 
Standard Chartered resumes paying dividends after posting a six-fold jump in annual pretax profit, but weaker-than-expected revenue dampens any celebration from investors. David Pollard reports.   
Standard Chartered resumes paying dividends after posting a six-fold jump in annual pretax profit, but weaker-than-expected revenue dampens any celebration from investors. David Pollard reports.  //reut.rs/2CMX3dp
